articles.title: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal

articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal. Former Justice Department antitrust chief Makan Delrahim is at the center of Paramount’s bid to wrestle Warner Bros. from Netflix.
